title: Lincoln's WARNING #100031: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up
script: Emergency broadcast hacked. Voice isn't human. What's the message? Alien transmission through our systems. Scan QR. Stop scrolling. Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up? They're selling you fear while pocketing profit. Classic misdirection. Now you know what they didn't want you to see. Support truth. Bitcoin below.
